msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Fix variableRowHeight support in GridDimensions and other various bugs. These changes also fix Grid to follow the correct measure rules such as rowHeight having a real effect on the typical row height.
Grid.as - The rowHeight is now backed by GridDimensions.defaultRowHeight now. Moved some clearing code down to commitProperties.

GridDimensions.as - Removed fixedRowHeight. Instead, we use a variableRowHeight Boolean that reflects the Grid’s value. The defaultRowHeight returns Grid’s rowHeight if rowHeight is explicitly set. If rowHeight isn’t set, defaultRowHeight returns the maximum typical cell height. defaultRowHeight also defaults to NaN now instead of 26.
GridLayout.as - Fixed an RTE from getItemRendererAt() in the case that bounds is null. Removed some excess code.
GridColumn.as - Fixed an edge case which was causing an RTE where someone sets the dataField to null.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Change getCellAt() to return CellPosition rather than Object.  Remove unused selectionContainsOnlyIndicesCR() method.  Optimize selectionContainsOnlyIndices() a bit.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Added support for explicitWidth,Height to DefaultGridItemRenderer and UITextFieldGridItemRenderer.

Although UITextField and UIFTETextField both sport explicitWidth,Height properties (but not a common class or interface that defines them) they don't automatically set these properties when you set their width,height and they reset width,height when you call setActualSize().     Since GridLayout only uses setlLayoutBounds() to resize a renderer, I set a flag there so that the concomitant calls to 'set width,height' don't also set explicitWidth,Height.
Removed the renderer constructor code that initialized the renderers actual width to 4096.   We're already dealing with that in createTypicalItemRenderer(), so the constructor code isn't needed.
QE notes: Mustella test case DataGrid_Properties_IR_WidthAll100Height needs to be updated
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Changed right padding from 10 to 5 in DefaultGridItemRenderer and UITextFieldGridItemRenderer.   Added the latter to spark-manifest.xml.
Fixed a horizontal scrolling performance problem introduced by SVN 17668.  Moved itemRenderer (IFactory) wrapping and caching from GridColumn to GridLayout/itemToRenderer().
QE notes: checkin tests pass, Mustella tests that fail due to the layout change have been excluded
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Fix bugs related to reducing the width of the dataGrid.  There is loop-prevention logic in ScrollerLayout/measure() which may not allow the width of the viewport to be reduced if there are automatic scrollbars.  To work around this set the viewport content size to 0,0 when we are about throwing out the layout cache and about to remeasure.
